metadata.title: CVE-2024-7625 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise from 0.6.1 up to 1.16.13, 1.7.10,and 1.8.2, the archive unpacking process is vulnerable to writes outsidethe allocation directory during migration of allocation directories whenmultiple archive headers target the same file. This vulnerability,CVE-2024-7625, is fixed in Nomad 1.6.14, 1.7.11, and 1.8.3. Access orcompromise of the Nomad client agent at the source allocation first is aprerequisite for leveraging this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: nomad package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
